ShieldOfFaith.description: When attacked 10% chance of negating damage

RabbitsFoot.description: Increases the chance to spawn better chests.

DivineCurse.quote: The well within deepens, the power grows.

TheBomb.description: Drop an explosive when you roll 10s cooldown.
